edit_post_input_case_foam_label: Whether to use case foam (Case foam)
edit_post_input_foam_remark_max_length_i: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_housing_color_max_length: Housing color can be entered in 50 characters or less.
edit_post_input_housing_name_max_length_: Housing names can be entered within 200 characters.
edit_post_input_is_flex_cut_pcb_label: Whether the PCB is flex-cut or not
edit_post_input_is_flex_cut_plate_label: Whether or not there is a flex-cut plate
edit_post_input_is_half_plate_label: Whether or not it is a half plate
edit_post_input_is_not_youtube_video_url: This is not a YouTube URL format.
edit_post_input_is_rgb_pcb_label: Whether it is RGB PCB or not
edit_post_input_is_silent_switch_label: Whether it is a silent switch
edit_post_input_keycap_manufacturer_max_: Keycap manufacturer can enter up to 100 characters.
edit_post_input_keycap_name_max_length_i: Keycap name can be entered within 200 characters.
edit_post_input_keycap_remark_max_length: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_pcb_foam_label: Whether to use switch bottom PE foam (PCB foam / PE sheet)
edit_post_input_pcb_name_max_length_is_2: The PCB name can be entered within 200 characters.
edit_post_input_pcb_remark_max_length_is: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_pcb_thickness_only_numbe: Only numbers or decimal points can be entered.
edit_post_input_plate_foam_label: Whether to use plate foam (Plate foam)
edit_post_input_plate_name_is_required: Please enter the name of the plate.
edit_post_input_plate_name_max_length_is: The plate name can be entered within 200 characters.
edit_post_input_plate_remark_max_length_: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_stabilizer_name_max_leng: The stabilizer name can be entered within 100 characters.
edit_post_input_stabilizer_remark_max_le: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_switch_bottom_out_force_: [Optional Input] Switch bottom out force (unit: g)
Only numbers or decimal points can be entered.
edit_post_input_switch_film_max_length_i: Switch film can be entered with 50 characters or less.
edit_post_input_switch_name_max_length_i: Switch name can be entered within 100 characters.
edit_post_input_switch_remark_max_length: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_switch_spring_length_onl: Only numbers or decimal points can be entered.
edit_post_input_title_is_required: Please enter a title for your post.
edit_post_input_title_max_length_is_200: Post titles can be entered within 200 characters.
edit_post_input_video_remark_max_length_: Special notes can be entered in 300 characters or less.
edit_post_input_youtube_video_url_max_le: The URL of the YouTube video can be entered within 3000 characters.
